title: Pulp fiction cover
content:

Which font is used to write: A film by Quentin Tarantino... etc.?

 [‹ (x) "Swinging Wake" - Coffin Nails {Spencer Cross (self)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203234223/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41493 "Go to previous forum topic") [Estate Agents Logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203234223/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41483 "Go to next forum topic")
author: olafurp

comments.content:
Your link doesn’t allow hotlinking of images, but I know the poster. It’s similar to Cascade Script or Blizzard but I don’t know the exact font.

- Lex
Thank you very much, Cascade script does the job very nicely.
